casebody.data:
D.A.N. JOINT VENTURE PROPERTIES OF NORTH CAROLINA, LLC
v.
N.C. GRANGE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY No. 45P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Susan E. Driscoll, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for D.A.N. Joint Venture Properties Of North Carolina, LLC. John R. Fonda, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Grange Mutual Insurance Company. Nathan D. Childs, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 11th of February 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
